TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

> 
> It's coming out Oct 1 here. Ads are all over the place and on those huge LCD TVs at shopping malls and transit hubs.

Oh wow! It's good to hear I won't have to wait an extra month to see it!

> 
> Yep, but if he doesn't show, Majorjim or I can do it.

 I will stick to next week. Waay to tired to do it tonight.

> 
> I will stick to next week. Waay to tired to do it tonight.

Okay, if, later, there's no news, we'll continue down the list, and if no one can do it, I'll step in.

My craft release won't make it for Friday; there's quite a bit of feasibility testing to do and I want to make sure everything works right before I release the craft file. And then I might as well get a narrator to do the voiceover for the showcase video.
Well, BlueCanary isn't on, if we wait much I won't be able to do it. How long do we wait?

> 
> Well, BlueCanary isn't on, if we wait much I won't be able to do it. How long do we wait?

You could either start now or wait until it is Saturday in all time zones.

> 
> You could either start now or wait until it is Saturday in all time zones.

Oh yeah, that makes more sense. I'm terrible with time zones, and I'll stop browsing the forums at around 8:00 PM PDT, when it's Saturday in all time zones someone else can do it.

> 
> It's coming out Oct 1 here. Ads are all over the place and on those huge LCD TVs at shopping malls and transit hubs.

October 1 as well, saw a few trailers in screens, and a movie poster.
Urm is someone going to have to do a subistute SCF?
I have the time, but I wouldn't be able to test the ships - I'm currently somewhere else.

Okay Im doing one just in case.

- - - Updated - - -

Okay done, about to release.
